name: Chikiana Jones and the Golden Eggs
name_original: Chikiana Jones and the Golden Eggs
description:
DO YOU WANT HEART PALPITATING ACTION?

Yeah!

DO YOU WANT ADRENALINE SURGING THROUGH YOUR VEINS?

Yeah! YEAH!

DO YOU WANT THE ENCROACHING DOOM CRAWL UP YOUR SPINE?

Ye-... Yeah?

WELL YOU'RE IN LUCK.  CHIKIANA JONES IS BACK WITH ANOTHER ONE OF HIS THRILLING ADVENTURES!

YEEEAHHHHHH!

Navigate through a dark dungeon as Chikiana Jones, and be wary of traps around every corner! Use your eyes, your wits, your skills to get to the egg!

Exploit every single opportunity! You only have one shot in the expedition, make it count!

Reaching the egg is only half the journey. Make use of what you've mapped out, your bridges, your tools, it's time to leg back the other half of the journey - getting out alive!

Chicken Jones, are you ready?

It's Chikiana Jones

Whatever.

========================

This game was made possible with the help from @polygitsune (twitter) and @GlassedHouse (twitter) for their art and music respectively!

Extra credits go to Dustyroom and Kenney for sounds.

This game was made for the Newgrounds July Jam 2021! What a thrilling ride!

========================

Follow my work!

I am most active at my Twitter account currently. You can follow for some informal updates about my shenanigans, and games I work on.

You can also check out my other games in itch.io.
